segments.text: Mr . Bellow , have you anything in mind as to what to drink or may I make a few suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have had enough gin fizz and bloody mary . But I have no idea about Chinese cocktails .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you prefer our cocktail — Shanghai cocktail ? It's a mixture of real Chinese ingredients .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( The waiter makes the cocktail for Mr . Bellow and hands into him . ) Here is your Shanghai cocktail , Mr . Bellow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Oh , it tastes excellent .
segments.speaker: S2
